seo.title: Returner coaching to re-enter work with confidence | SustainSage
seo.description: ICF-aligned coaching for professionals returning after caregiving, study, illness, or time abroad.

hero.title: Return to work with steadiness and self-trust.
hero.subtitle: We rebuild rhythms, narratives, and support systems so your next chapter feels sustainable.

who.title: Who this is for
items: You’re returning after parental leave, caregiving, or a family move.
You’re re-entering after illness, burnout, or a wellbeing pause.
You’re coming back to the UK workforce after years abroad.
You’re renegotiating identity as you combine paid and unpaid roles.

what.title: What we work on
items: Rebuilding confidence with updated narratives and realistic pacing.
Mapping support systems at home and work so you’re not carrying everything alone.
Designing phased returns, project pilots, or part-time arrangements that fit.
Setting boundaries that protect health while you rebuild momentum.

how.title: How it works
how.description: Gentle structure that respects the season you’re in.
items: Six 60-minute sessions over 3–4 months on Zoom, timed around childcare, health, or study needs.
Sessions are co-designed to respond to live reintegration wins and hurdles.
Between-session support through shared notes, voice memos, or Loom when you need quick reflection.
We offer accountability and compassion without promising specific job offers or timelines.

items.title: Phased return after parental leave
items.description: We negotiated workload boundaries, clarified childcare backup plans, and practiced conversations about flexible hours.

items.title: Re-entry after a health pause
items.description: A consultant designed a gradual rebuild, balancing client work with treatment, and created scripts to discuss capacity honestly.

items.title: Coming back from overseas
items.description: We reframed international experience for UK employers, mapped a local support network, and staged commitments to avoid overwhelm.

expect.title: What you can expect
items: Grounded confidence in the story you tell about your return.
A realistic plan that honours both ambition and care responsibilities.
Stronger boundaries that keep you from sliding back into burnout.
Momentum built through small, deliberate actions you choose.

ethics.title: Ethics & fit
items: Confidential, ICF-aligned coaching that respects the vulnerability of returning.
We collaborate with your therapists or doctors when you invite it and keep roles clear.
You call the pace; we never push hustle, guilt, or one-size-fits-all paths.
We refer to specialised career, legal, or wellbeing support when it serves you better.

cta.title: Want support as you re-enter work?
cta.body: Book an intro chat so we can understand your timeline and design the right level of support.
